title: Big nose: Takeshi Hoshino with the Tasmanian Puppet Theatre
brief_description: This film explores the concept of puppetry as an art form as it goes backstage at the Tasmanian Puppet Theatre. Takeshi Hoshino, art director from Japan’s Puk Theatre designs and directs the production of “Big Nose”, a traditional Japanese story. Suitable for years prep-6 and lower secondary levels.
